msg: pod manpages are now glued to all .pm files for which .pod exists

author: stas
msg: - make sure that $b->remove is not called before $r->read. since if it
does, and there is a filebucket, it'll get split into more than bucket and
all but the first bucket will be lost. after read() it's safe to unlink
- while fixing the above issue, simplified several filter/protocol tests

author: stas
msg: use $b for bucket in all tests, to make it easier do global adjustements
